title: Through It Came Bright Colors
description: Neil Cullane is a closeted, conflicted 21 year old who lives in two worlds light years apart. At home, he's the dutiful son of Frank and Grace, and devoted brother to Peter who is battling cancer. But in the shadows of San Francisco underworld, Neil finds release with secret lover Vince, a beautiful junkie, philospher and thief.
author: Trebor Healey
